explanations.reason: The paper focuses on the financial implications and motivators of corporate engagement with the Science Based Targets Initiative (SBTi), utilizing statistical methods like Difference-in-Differences (DiD) regression analysis and Probit models. There is no mention or use of machine learning techniques, neural networks, or any other AI-related methodologies in the study. The research is grounded in statistical analysis of financial and environmental data, not in machine learning or deep learning approaches.
